Package actions.targeters.targets

Class BasicTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • actions.targeters.targets.BasicTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointLike, TargetedSelector, Visible, Targetable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DominationPointTarget
    public class BasicTarget
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable, PointLike, Visible, TargetedSelector
    This target primarily identifies an individual Pawn, be it a player controlled pawn, a terminator, a turret or a domination point.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      BasicTarget​(@NotNull DamageableUID target)
      This creates a template for the BasicTarget, it's needed because of the bootstrap phase during the map creation

      • distanceSelector

        public java.util.Set<TileUID> distanceSelector​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                               int radius,
                                               boolean logical)
        The method used for the "distant [from] this" selector
        Specified by:
        distanceSelector in interface PointLike
        Parameters:
        radius - is the maximum distance, anything less than 0 should return an empty set, with 0 returning just the UIDs.TileUID of the current cell
        logical - if true only consider logical links
        sandbox - the sandbox on which to evaluate the function
        Returns:
        a list of reachable points in the given amount of steps or less

      • reachedCondition

        public boolean reachedCondition​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                int min,
                                int max,
                                @NotNull
                                PointLike source,
                                boolean negation)
        this can be reached by source?
        Specified by:
        reachedCondition in interface TargetedSelector
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum included distance (0 includes the current tile, negative values return an empty set
        max - the maximum included distance
        source - the PointLike Target for which reachableSelector is calculated
        negation - whether the condition should be negated or not
        Returns:
        negation XOR whether this can be reached by the source in the given number of steps

      • distanceCondition

        public boolean distanceCondition​(Sandbox sandbox,
                                 int min,
                                 int max,
                                 @NotNull
                                 @NotNull PointLike source,
                                 boolean negation,
                                 boolean logical)
        this is distant from source?
        Specified by:
        distanceCondition in interface TargetedSelector
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum included distance (0 includes the current tile, negative values return an empty set
        max - the maximum included distance
        source - the PointLike Target from which the distance is calculated
        negation - whether the condition should be negated or not
        logical - whether to go through walls
        Returns:
        negation XOR whether this is in the distance range from source
